recommendations: Prattipati Vidyasagar “If I have to define you in a line or two, it would be : You do the things which you love and you love the things which you do. Two of them are Football and Geology. I recommend you not to cease doing such things. As you always want to learn as much as you can and go back to your place to help out your people there, I strongly recommend you not to lose the zeal in accomplishing it. All the best !! ”

Subhasis Pal “We have studied together since 2017 and are looking forward to being more beautiful moments. There are lots of memories in hostel, field and the class as well. You are very passionate about football and the research in the field of geology to find the batter way to solve the mysterious thoughts. Your curious nature one-day make you very successful to be evaluated by how happy you are. You have worked in different fields of geology and will have more ahead. Best wishes on behalf of me and wish you all success in your life.”
